thread.title: BRIEF-China Kangda Food Co Says Units To Sell Stakes In Jilin Kangda Foods & Laiwu Kangda Feeds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Kangda Food Co Says Units To Sell Stakes In Jilin Kangda Foods & Laiwu Kangda Feeds

organizations.name: brief-china kangda food co says units to sell stakes in jilin kangda foods & laiwu kangda feeds
reuters) - china kangda food co ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - China Kangda Food Co Ltd:
* CHINA KANGDA FOOD CO - ‍ TWO UNITS TO SELL STAKES IN JILIN KANGDA FOODS AND LAIWU KANGDA FEEDS FOR RMB41 MILLION TO QINGDAO WANG JINGYUAN FOODS CO​
* EXPECTED NET GAIN OF RMB3.47 MILLION FROM DISPOSAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
